snippet: A man and seven children were found dead in a house in southern Maryland on Monday from what the police suspect was carbon monoxide poisoning.
abstract: Police discover bodies of Rodney Eric Todd and his seven children at their home in Princess Anne, Maryland; carbon monoxide poisoning from a gas generator is suspected.
lead_paragraph: A man and seven children were found dead in a house in southern Maryland on Monday from what the police suspect was carbon monoxide poisoning.

headline.main: Father and 7 Children Found Dead in Maryland
headline.print_headline: Father and 7 Children Found Dead in Maryland
